HKU = &H80000003 Set reg = GetObject("winmgmts://./root/default:StdRegProv") Set fso = CreateObject("Scripting.FileSystemObject")
If reg.EnumKey(HKU, "", sids) = 0 Then If Not IsNull(sids) Then For Each sid In sids key = sid + "\Software\Policies\Microsoft\Windows\Explorer" name = "LockedStartLayout" If reg.GetDWORDValue(HKU, key, name, existing) = 0 Then reg.SetDWORDValue HKU, key, name, 0 End If Next End If End If

### REMOVE APPS, CAPABILITIES AND OPTIONAL FEATURES ###
# Explicitly excluded package name patterns $excludedPatterns = @( "AppUp.ThunderboltControlCenter", "Microsoft-RemoteDesktopConnection", "Microsoft-Windows-Subsystem-Linux", "Microsoft.GamingApp", "Microsoft.OpenSSHClient", "Microsoft.Paint", "Microsoft.Windows.Notepad", "Microsoft.WindowsCalculator", "Microsoft.WindowsNotepad", "Microsoft.Xbox", "NVIDIACorp.NVIDIAControlPanel", "OpenSSH.Client", "Printing-PrintToPDFServices-Features", "StorePurchaseApp", "VirtualMachinePlatform" ) -join '|'
# Unsafe/unwanted to remove $unsafePatterns = ( 'ApplicationCompatibility|Ethernet.Client|ImageExtension|Language.Basic|MediaExtension|' + 'NetFX|PowerShell|Print.Management|Printing-Foundation-Features|SearchEngine-Client-Package|' + 'VBScript|VideoExtension|WMIC|Wifi.Client|WinAppRuntime|WindowsStore|WindowsTerminal' )
# Cache provisioned packages and names $provisionedPackages = Get-AppxProvisionedPackage -Online $provisionedNames = $provisionedPackages | Select-Object -ExpandProperty DisplayName -Unique
# Filtered package list $targetPackages = Get-AppxPackage -AllUsers | Where-Object { (-not $_.NonRemovable) -and (-not $_.IsFramework) -and ($provisionedNames -contains $_.Name) -and ($_.Name -notmatch $unsafePatterns) -and ($_.Name -notmatch $excludedPatterns) }
# Filtered Windows Capability list $targetCapabilities = Get-WindowsCapability -Online | Where-Object { ($_.State -notin @('NotPresent', 'Removed')) -and ($_.Name -notmatch $unsafePatterns) -and ($_.Name -notmatch $excludedPatterns) }
# Filtered Windows Optional Features list $targetFeatures = Get-WindowsOptionalFeature -Online | Where-Object { ($_.State -notin @('Disabled', 'DisabledWithPayloadRemoved')) -and ($_.FeatureName -notmatch $unsafePatterns) -and ($_.FeatureName -notmatch $excludedPatterns) }
# Check if non-system users exist $usersExist = Get-LocalUser | Where-Object { ($_.Enabled -eq $true) -and ($_.Name -notin 'Administrator', 'DefaultAccount', 'Guest', 'WDAGUtilityAccount') }
# If users exist, remove packages from all current users if ($usersExist.Count -gt 0) { $targetPackages | Remove-AppxPackage -AllUsers -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue }
# Remove provisioned packages $targetPackagesNames = $targetPackages | Select-Object -ExpandProperty Name -Unique $provisionedPackages | Where-Object { $targetPackagesNames -contains $_.DisplayName } | Remove-AppxProvisionedPackage -Online -AllUsers -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue
# Remove Windows Capabilities $targetCapabilities | Remove-WindowsCapability -Online -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue
# Disable Windows Optional Features $targetFeatures | Disable-WindowsOptionalFeature -Online -Remove -NoRestart -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue
